pr_title: HDDS-4600. SCM HA Config Phase 1: Use SCMNodeDetails as the entry to initialize SCM except for Ratis servers

timeline.bodyText:
Currently SCMNodeDetails will always be built from default configuration to pass existing UT.
The HA configuration is left to be used by MiniOzoneHACluster.
timeline.author: amaliujia

timeline.bodyText: I haven't written test case for this. Want to wait for some feedback before I continue improving this PR.
timeline.author: amaliujia

timeline.message: HDDS-4600. Use OM style Configuration to initialize SCM HA
HDDS-4600. Add OM style Configuration to initialize SCM HA

timeline.bodyText: Can we move this to NodeDetails class itself?
timeline.author: bshashikant

replies.bodyText:
Probably not.
SCMNodeDetails and OMNodeDetails do not share the same fields. E.g. OMNodeDetails uses RPC port while SCMNodeDetails has three different server port.
replies.author: amaliujia

timeline.bodyText: These functions can be moved to a utility and used by both OM and SCM as required. Nothing seems specific ti SCM here.
timeline.author: bshashikant

replies.bodyText: I created a common utility and moved some functions there.
replies.author: amaliujia

timeline.message: HDDS-4600. Add OM style Configuration to initialize SCM HA

timeline.bodyText: is there any specific reason to maintain rpc port specifically in OMNodeDetails? I guess, it can be common for both SCM and OM and we can maintain it in NodeDetails itself.
timeline.author: bshashikant

replies.bodyText:
I might not have a correct understanding:
SCM does not need a single RPC port, it has three: datanode, client and block server.
That why this diverges: OM maintains its rpc port while SCM maintains three ports.
If this is not correct, I can make a change in a subsequence PR.
replies.author: amaliujia
